Quest77.name: Quest77
Quest77.desc: Gives you a pocketwatch that fast forwards a day, restocking shops and triggering various daily rewards and systems. One use only, of course.

Quest76.name: Quest76
Quest76.desc: This pocketwatch on the other hand alters your daily reset time forward or backward by 15 mins, your choice. Silver is kinda lame, so have some on the house!

EquipmentHats89.name: EquipmentHats89
EquipmentHats89.desc: He really went and did it for you, what a good boy! He sits atop your head, acting as a nice premium hat.

GemP18.name: GemP18
GemP18.desc: Turns the 1st liquid cauldron DRAGONIC (or 2nd or 3rd if you already own dragonic cauldrons). These give 2x Liquid Capacity, and 1.3x liquid generation.

Quest79.name: Quest79
Quest79.desc: Gives a bundle of 50 treats to open! There are 3 Falloween masks to collect, as well as the Falloween Nametag once you open 500 in total!

desc: Gives 25 trophies to spend in the Weekly Battle shop on new UI! Find the weekly battle in World 2 town, top right.
15% OFF! Gives 25 trophies to spend in the Weekly Battle shop on new UI! Find the weekly battle in World 2 town, top right.
500 arcade balls. Use these at the Arcade, found at the clown in World 2 town! +33% better value compared to smol ball pack!
20% OFF, usually costs 1250! Gives 500 arcade balls, directly into your arcade to be dropped!
10% OFF, usually costs 480! Use this on a 4 star card to upgrade it to 5 stars! It works like 4 star cardifiers, you get to choose which card gets upgraded, no randomness involved!
Use this on a 4 star card to upgrade it to 5 stars! It works like 4 star cardifiers, you get to choose which card gets upgraded, no randomness involved!
